narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 16-year-old male was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-10-03T21:57:05.225455+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend.
behavioral_patterns: entered vehicle and headed northbound on I-95
turned onto US-58 east toward Suffolk
narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 2 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel northbound along I-95. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia.

witness_accounts.description: Around 4 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (16-year-old male, wearing plaid shirt, black joggers, white sneakers) near King and Queen.
witness_accounts.clothing: plaid shirt, black joggers, white sneakers
witness_accounts.behavior: backing up vehicle to block driveway

news.title: Missing male child reported in Alexandria
news.excerpt: Authorities are searching for a 16-year-old male last seen in Alexandria, Virginia.

social_media.text: Please help find missing child in Alexandria area. Last seen wearing plaid shirt, black joggers, white sneakers

provenance._fulltext: A 16-year-old male was last seen at Alexandria at 2025-10-03T21:57:05.225455+00:00. The child was reported missing by parent after failing to meet a friend. Within 2 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel northbound along I-95. A white 2016 Jeep Grand Cherokee was observed departing near Alexandria, Virginia. Around 4 hours later, a neighbor reported someone matching the description (16-year-old male, wearing plaid shirt, black joggers, white sneakers) near King and Queen.
